definition: to know well/to be fully aware of

sentences.english: From the above-mentioned story we can see that Mencius mother realized the importance of environment for children's development.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，孟母深知环境对孩子成长的影响。

sentences.english: Mentally strong people recognize that they don't need to please everyone all the time.
sentences.chinese: 内心强大之人深知随时溜须拍马毫无必要。

sentences.english: I know no way of judging of the future but by the past.
sentences.chinese: 我深知，除了经历，决无别的可用来判断未来。

sentences.english: He knows how we speak when we’re desperate.
sentences.chinese: 祂深知我们在绝望中说话的方式。

sentences.english: She knew she lacked the organizational skills to “take the company to the next level.
sentences.chinese: 她深知缺少有组织的技能使公司跨越到下一个层次。

sentences.english: The hearts of the people are the life of the country.
Believe me, your boss understands this fact.
sentences.chinese: 相信我，你的上司深知这个事实。

sentences.english: Only a win will do away at Treviso, a team Deschamps seems to know well.
sentences.chinese: 客战特雷维索要全力争胜，德尚的球队深知这一点。

sentences.english: The tortoise realizes that he runs slowly so that he goes forward constantly.
sentences.chinese: 乌龟深知自己跑得慢，因此，他不断前进。

sentences.english: Liu Li knew that going through customs would be a lot easier than obtaining a U.
sentences.chinese: 刘丽深知通过海关比获得美国签证会容易些。

sentences.english: Than Shwe well knows how a low-profile subordinate can overthrow the leader.
sentences.chinese: 丹瑞深知一个低调的属下能够对其上级进行颠覆。

sentences.english: America’s founders acutely were aware of the importance of religious freedom.
sentences.chinese: 美国的建国先贤深知宗教自由的重要性。

sentences.english: Mrs. Sommers knew the value of finding things for sale at reduced prices.
sentences.chinese: 萨默斯太太深知寻找降价销售的物品有多重要。

sentences.english: We have real power and we know it.
sentences.chinese: 我们具有真正的伟力，我们深知这一点。

sentences.english: Maxim people know that a hundred years to do business, good business reputation is essential.
sentences.chinese: 美心人深知要做百年企业，良好的商业信誉至关重要。

sentences.english: I am well aware of the expectations that accompany my presidency around the world.
sentences.chinese: 我深知全世界对我就任总统的瞩望。

definition: to believe (sth in relation to oneself)/to regard oneself as/to acknowledge (sth in relation to oneself)/to resign oneself to
it is obvious that.../as one can well imagine...
to have no alternative (idiom); compelled by circumstances/forced into sth
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
